name: Pirates Gems Treasure - Jewel Free Edition
name_original: Pirates Gems Treasure - Jewel Free Edition
description:
Pirates Gems Treasure - Jewel free match 3 puzzle game.
Game Features
- 3 Modes in 1 game for you to run
- Classic Mode reach a specific point goal to solve the puzzle simulator.
- Advanced Mode to challenge your power to crush & blast the jewels block, fight with pirate king!
- Time Attack match in the fast and furious speed to splash & gain the golden coin prize!
- Music Background. Simply exit completely to get out from the background music
